document.full_text: stoke will play manchester city in the first fa cup final of the team's 148-year history after trouncing bolton 5-0 on sunday.
document.title: stoke blows out bolton 5-0 to reach fa cup final vs. manchester city
lines_and_colors: stoke will play manchester city in the first fa cup final of the team's 148-year history after trouncing bolton 5-0 on sunday.
